item.title: Report E-2023090689
item.description:
Report E-2023090689

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On September 12, 2023, one (1) box of UN2031 was punctured and released approximately less-than one (<1) gallon of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Miller Environmental Group (MEG) to remediate the site. MEG deconstructed the pallet and removed one (1) damaged box from the pallet. The crew deployed a neutralizing agent to the trailer. The damaged product and spent neutralizer were placed into two (2) 55-gallon drums and the packaging debris was placed into one (1) 55-gallon drum for transport and disposal.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND WET ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING ABOUT 1 OUNCE TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090341
item.description:
Report X-2023090341

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: HALETHORPE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090341 SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and removed from the system flow. DescribePack: Package found leaking due to a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a drum and taken to the hazmat cage. 2. X-2023090375 SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and pulled from the system flow. DescribePack: Package appears to have leaked due to a failed closure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a drum and taken to the cage.
